data.name: AfterMas (余波) Demo
data.detailed_description:
Special Edition

We are offering in-engine game file to the public, you can build you own game upon that. For more information please contact use Steam forum to contact me.


About the Game

Important Notifications

-- This is still a on-going project, does not represent the final quality.
-- Some assets come from the internet.
--The game will be free wo download and offering original in-engine progress documents.

About the game

--High detailed design of map, featuring five different territories.
--Have a complete First person shooting system with both hand and gun animation.
--Now having more than 10 different weapons that fully animated and playable.
--Powered by Unreal Engine 4 with Ray-Trace ON.
--Remastered Dust II A bomb site.



--Motion captured actions, animated first person arm movements and gun fire.



--Flexible choice of attachments which you can custome your own weapon.

More feature will be included soon.......

data.short_description: A game project developed by one man, featuring up to 4k resolution of textures, five unique styles contain in one map. Powered by advanced global illumination and Ray-Tracing enabled to simulate real world visual quality. If you interested you can even join me with this project, bring fun to others.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-8100 @ 3.1 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti or AMD HD 6950 (At least 2G of VRam)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: For laptop at least 6th Gen of i7 and GTX 960 is required(1080P 30FPS)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K @ 4.0 Ghz or AMD Ryzen 5 2500X @ 3.6 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD RX 480 (or better)
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Laptop recommendation with i7 7th Gen and GTX 1060 (1080P High 60+Fps 2K 30+FPS)

data.ext_user_account_notice: Epic Games Launcher (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
